statements: DELETE FROM customers_transactions WHERE customer_id = 500 AND transaction_amount > 100;
DELETE FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 123 AND customer_id = 456;
DELETE FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 202 AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM fraud_transactions WHERE fraud_reason = 'Fraudulent Transaction' AND fraud_id = 123;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main St' AND customer_id = 456;
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 123 AND account_type = 'Savings';
